オプション1: More time had passed since Star Man made the contract.

One day, Star Man decided to visit "Gip Lighthouse" shown on the map.
He kept walking toward the mountain summit and arrived at his destination.

There was a chubby man gazing out at the sea.
Hearing Star Man's footsteps, the man turned around.
Star Man gave a slight bow.
The chubby man stood perfectly still, as if time had stopped.
The man gave a small bow.
"Nice to meet you. Do you live around here?"
The man approached with heavy steps.
The man shot Star Man a sharp glare.
"Don't talk to me. Don't come near me."
Star Man fell to the ground.
"I won't come near here again. Relax."
The man poked Star Man with his foot.

Star Man started to head back, keeping an eye behind him,
but the man had drawn a knife.
